select (select count(*) from member where gender like 'F') "여성 회원수", (select count(*) from member where gender like 'M') "남성 회원수", (select count(*) from member where gender is null) "기타 회원수" from dual

select (select count(*) from member where age = 10) "10대 회원수", (select count(*) from member where age = 20) "20대 회원수", (select count(*) from member where age = 30) "30대 회원수", (select count(*) from member where age = 40) "40대 회원수", (select count(*) from member where age is null) "기타 회원수" from dual
select (select count(*) from member m) "전체 회원수", (select count(*) from member where drop_date is not null) "탈퇴 회원", (select count(*) from member where drop_date is null) "현재 회원수" from dual

select (select count(*) from board) "전체 게시글 수", (select count(*) from board where bdate like sysdate) "오늘 게시글", (select count(*) from board where bcode = 1) "자유 게시글 수", (select count(*) from board where bcode = 2) "정보공유 게시글 수", (select count(*) from board where bcode = 3) "여행후기 게시글 수", (select count(*) from board where bcode = 4) "질문 게시글 수" from dual

select to_char(bdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "날짜", count(*) "개수", SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER(ORDER BY to_char(bdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) "누적 게시글" from board where bdate >= '2019-01-01' and bdate < '2019-01-31' group by to_char(bdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by to_char(bdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
